content.en: Efficient Langevin Dynamics: Scientists have been exploring various algorithms to improve the efficiency and accuracy of Langevin dynamics simulations. These algorithms include different discretization combinations, numerical analytical propagator algorithms, multiple time step integration, long-time-step methods, and likelihood-based estimation. By using these algorithms, researchers aim to better understand the dynamics of biomolecules, reconstruct equilibrium profiles, simulate Langevin dynamics more effectively, and compute extended Markov parameterizations.
content.da: Effektive Langevin-dynamikker: Forskere har udforsket forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre effektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af Langevin-dynamik-simuleringer. Disse algoritmer omfatter forskellige diskretiseringskombinationer, numeriske analytiske forplantningsalgoritmer, flertrinsintegration, langsigtede metoder og estimater baseret på sandsynlighed. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod bedre at forstå biomolekylers dynamik, rekonstruere ligevægtsprofiler, simulere Langevin-dynamikker mere effektivt og beregne udvidede Markov-parametriseringer.
